Galileo Mark Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor

Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent scientific papers and edges represent citations between them. The goal is to classify the papers into different research fields.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Mark Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Gallagher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes are scientific papers and edges are citations. The dataset is used for classifying papers into different categories.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Mark Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Gallagher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A dataset of scientific papers in the biomedical domain, where nodes represent papers and edges represent citations. The task is to classify the papers into different medical categories.
dcterms:title: PubMed

dcterms:creator: Weihua Hu
Matthias Fey
Marinka Zitnik

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for graph machine learning, containing various types of graphs including citation networks, co-authorship networks, and social networks.
dcterms:title: arXiv

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Mark Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Gallagher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A dataset representing co-authorship in computer science, where nodes are authors and edges represent co-authorship relationships. The goal is to classify authors into their most active research fields.
dcterms:title: CS

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Mark Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Gallagher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A dataset representing co-authorship in physics, where nodes are authors and edges represent co-authorship relationships. The goal is to classify authors into their most active research fields.
dcterms:title: Physics

dcterms:creator: Junteng Jia
Austin R. Benson
dcterms:description: A dataset representing U.S. counties during the 2016 presidential election, where nodes are counties and edges represent social ties. The goal is to predict the winning party in each county.
dcterms:title: Election

dcterms:creator: Junteng Jia
Austion R Benson
dcterms:description: A dataset representing sexual interactions, where nodes are individuals and edges represent sexual interactions. The goal is to predict the gender of individuals.
dcterms:title: Sexual

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from Bitcoin transactions, where nodes represent transactions and edges represent payment flows. The goal is to classify transactions as licit or illicit.
dcterms:title: Elliptic

dcterms:creator: Aldo Pareja
Giacomo Domeniconi
Jie Chen

Hiroki Kanezashi

Tao B. Schardl
Charles E. Leiserson
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of synthetic payments that resemble real-world data, where nodes represent transactions and edges represent payment flows. The goal is to classify transactions as fraudulent or non-fraudulent.
dcterms:title: Payments

dcterms:creator: Weihua Hu
Matthias Fey
Marinka Zitnik
Yuxiao Dong
Hongyu Ren
Bowen Liu
Michele Catasta
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A dataset of products on Amazon, where nodes represent products and edges connect co-purchased products. The goal is to classify products into different categories.
dcterms:title: Products

dcterms:creator: Miller McPherson
Lynn Smith-Lovin
James M Cook
dcterms:description: Synthetic datasets sampled from Markov random fields, used to model homophily and heterophily in social networks.
dcterms:title: Synthetic MRF datasets (Ising+, Ising−, MRF+, MRF−)
